text: Shegufta Bakht Chaudhuri (known as S B Chaudhuri; 1931 â€“ 11 November 2020) was a Bangladeshi economist and politician. He was the fourth governor of Bangladesh Bank from 1987 to 1992. He was born in Habiganj District, Bengal Presidency. Chaudhuri died on 11 November 2020 in Dhaka. ==References== Category:1931 births Category:2020 deaths Category:Politicians from Sylhet Division Category:Bangladeshi businesspeople Category:Bangladeshi economists
